ready_to_bring_your_digital_dreams_to_li: Ready to bring your digital dreams to life!
presentation_description: Crafting immersive experiences through mobile app design and visual development is my forte. Let's turn your ideas into captivating realities!
tok_tik_description: An app simulating the de TikTok o reels form Instagarm app.
cinemapedia_description: An app where you can view information about your favorite movies, such as actors, release year. You can search by categories and save your preferences.
widgets_app_description: An application showcasing various types of Flutter widgets, using Material 3. Applies dynamic dark & light theme change and color variations.
cuote_1: Transforming ideas into exceptional mobile experiences:
cuote_2: Designing the future, one app at a time!
